alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 4:36PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN ADAMS AND NORTH CENTRAL WHITMAN COUNTIES... At 436 PM PST, an area of heavy snow was located 8 miles east of Ritzville, or 40 miles southwest of Cheney, moving east at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Colfax, Ritzville, Lind, Rosalia, St. John, Endicott, Malden, Lamont, Batum, Tokio, Revere, Ralston, Pizzro, Winona, Ewen, Ewan, Marcellus, Packard, Diamond, and Schoonover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 202 and 238. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 82 and 96. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes. &&
